text: @KLoeffler @BernieSanders On January 20th South Korea and the U.S. had their first coronavirus case. SK did 300,000+ test. Donald Trump's failure to lead has this country & its citizens locked in their houses because he says the federal government doesn't do testing. What Hope? What Freedom? What liberty?
